00051       typedef enum tCurlAccountAddReturn{
00052         CAA_SUCCESS,        
00053         CAA_EXISTS,         
00054         CAA_EMPTY_NAME,     
00055         CAA_EMPTY_PWD,      
00056         CAA_EMPTY_MAIL,     
00057         CAA_MAIL_INUSE,     
00058         CAA_MAIL_SIGN_AT,   
00059         CAA_MAIL_SIGN_DOT,  
00060         CAA_UNDEFINED,      
00061         CAA_UNKNOWN         
00062       };
00063 
00067       class CurlAccountAdd : public CurlSubmitForm{
00068       public:
00069         CurlAccountAdd();
00070         ~CurlAccountAdd();
00071 
00072         void setName(const char*);
00073         void setPassword(const char*);
00074         void setMail(const char*);
00075         tCurlAccountAddReturn getResponse();
00076 
00077       protected:
00078         virtual bool controlBefore();
00079         virtual bool controlAfter();
00080 
00081       private:

00086       };
